alert.note: Alert for Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 2:26PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nassau, west central Camden, southeastern Ware and northeastern Charlton Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 226 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Stephen Foster State Park, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Hilliard, Folkston and Homeland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
